txt.en: 'There's something sinister lurking upon the banks of the Greyflood. A scout reported strange flickering fires among the drowned ruins at the edge of the marshes, and dark apparitions beneath the water's surface. If my fears are true, then some dark magic has taken hold in that place, possibly through some artifice of the Enemy.'\n\n'See if you can find these apparitions, and gain some sense of the foe that lurks here.'
Return to Hithriel and tell him of your findings
With your mission in the ruins successful, you should return to the mission giver and tell them of your findings.
'You have done well [placeholder]. As agreed, you are deserving of payment. Take this and know that we are grateful for all you have done.'
'Be careful [placeholder]. We cannot be certain what lurks in those waters.'
Speak with the mission giver and let them know that you are ready to investigate the ruins along the banks of the Greyflood.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: Shadows in the Greyflood
Something is lurking among the ruins along the banks of the Greyflood, and you have been asked to investigate.
